GSD.description:
NFSD: prevent integer overflow on 32 bit systems

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.33 by commit 303cd6173dce0a28d26526c77814eb90a41bd898. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: NFSD: prevent integer overflow on 32 bit systems
